reviews.review:
Right my last review off this game wasnt so good since back then i hadnt put much time into the game but i now i can put a good review together

1.If u want to play this game how  it was ment to be played 5v5 search and destroy(you wont have much luck)

2.If u are getting this game to play random gamemodes With your friends Then yes its fun.

3.If u are going to do number 2 Get garry's mod 

Hope this helped :D
Un des volets le plus sympatique de la SAGA!!! :)
Nice game for playing single or in a clan...I really enjoyed it...!!!!!
Сколько лет играю в Counter Strike Source , все равно не надоедает.
steam must have, great partner with garys mod, amazing fps, one of the best out there...
This is one of my favorite games EVER!!! I recommend this to anyone that has a computer.

Alright, it is a good game, I have to admit that, but the reason I don't recommend this game is because multiplayer is usually filled with clans or tryhards that talk about BS 24/7 and talk about being 420 yolo sniper clan. So first part is how it is filled with children or idiots arguing or talking about BS. Second part is how it doesn't use logic, I could use a shotgun on a person at point blank range and it only take 45 health from them, same going for grenade, grenades are much more powerful than doing 15-25 damage. Then there is shooting through pure steel platforms, it would bounce off from the steel, not pierce unless every gun comes with Full metal Jacket rounds. Third one is the community, this is what I couldn't deal with besides the logic. I am VERY tired of seeing people cry and scream and play dubstep ear rape over the voice chat. If you want a decent FPS game, then do not get this unless you enjoy all the above.
Extremely good game. Can be fast paced. Only down side is bots can take for ever to find each other :)
Good ol' Counter-Strike Source. Less ''arcade'' than CS 1.6 and CS:GO, but still a lot of fun.

Really good game for competitive gamers (Itleast on some servers). This game has decent graphics for when it came out. It has a nice set of community to. There are alot of really good players is one problem, for example when i started out on Counter Strike Source i was obviously a noob, i really did suck but the good part about this game is the weapons are easy to get used to and its easy to find your personal weapon, pistol, equipment etc. Counter Strike Source is a great series and if you're a counter strike fan you will probally love this game (I dont know about you global offensers). There is so many gamemodes that people create and you can choose from! For example, Deathrun , Scout Knives , Hostage Rescuing ( Dunno if thats default ) Gun game, etc. Personally, you will probally love this game if you like a wide open choices of gamemodes, guns , and just about anything!

PEOPLE WITH SLOW COMPUTERS READ BELOW
____
____                                                                
For people with terrible computers and love FPS games but have a hard time running them, you have a nice chance of running the graphics on --LOW--. My graphics card is rated 22/7000, terrible right? i made everything low and i got about 60 fps. Anyways hope you buy or download or what ever you do to get this game you will probally enjoy it if you're a CS fan
Still love this game, never gets old.
Great multiplayer game the graphics aren't exetremely good but they will work.

Та самая альтернатива, которая не то что заменит, но сможет дать вам отдохнуть от той же самой CS:GO. Counter-Strike без моделей оружия за реальные деньги или же что-то подобного, просто часть, которая в которой можно найти куча серверов от обычных игроков с разными модами и весёлыми режимами.

Зачем покупать, если можно скачать?
very pleased with this game! entertains much
Great game I had more than 300 hours on it and it is the best of the series of Counter Strike
like counter strike 1.6 but with better graphic ,i recomend you not to buy CS 1.6 but buy this SOURCE version of the game or global ofensive if you have a good computer

Really fun game. Although at the start yo will get done up pretty bad.
i have played this for a couple of years and its still very fun to play
Super jeu facile a prendre en main !

Достоная игра серии,со своими недостатками и достоинствами.Counter-Strike: Source нечто среднее между 1.6 и CS:GO в плане самой игры- движка.В остальном это старая добрая CS со своими школьниками и читерами.Конешно сейчас у нее нету того величия, которое было у этой игры,но все равно она будет однойиз самых моих любимых игр.

This game is the most competetive and fun shooter you are going to find for PC.the winning formula of the Source engine on this game has had an enormous effect,just like it has on every CS game.the game has no leveling system but a simple system of:the more expensive it is,the better it will perform.you kill enemies,complete objectives,win rounds.all these will give you money,you use the money to buy better weapons,if you cant afford a better weapon,than you are going to have to do with what you have.In a way,the game forces you to be a team player,but not for "the feeling".it forces you in a way thagt you will do better if you play as a team,you will get more money and you will buy better guns and equipments,its something 'bloated games'today do wrong.The gunplay is what keeps this game top notch amongs other shooters for pc.At first you are going to get killed a lot by the vets that have been playing this game for quite a while,but nothing is more satisfying that playing in a server with many other players(some even way better than you)and to manage to buy and use an AWP efficntly,or the first headshot you land with a deagle at range with perfect precision.the game will keep you on your toes at all times.a nd if you are not the type of guy who likes to stay on your toes all the time,try some custom modes.deathrun,zombies and much more will require you to sometimes outsmart your opponents and think out of the box.

10/10 seriously get this,its going to be worth it for quite a long while.

Counter-Strike Source has been a part of my life for many years, going back to the days when I first discovered what an internet café was. SInce then, whenever I think of what games I could not live without, this game always makes the list. Given that my laptop runs very low specs I cannot run CS:GO, but I still get to play Source. This is a classic FPS which should be present in every gamer's collection.

10/10

Эту игру я купил потому что я в неё играл ещё когда был маленьким. Она предельно сложна. Но это ещё прикольней. Вообщем кто любит пострелять советую именно эту эпичную игру Counter-Strike: Source

English: A very good game, only improved on by Counterstrike:Global Offensive however this game may be difficult for new players as the average person you'll come up against is very good.

العربية: لعبة جيدة جدا، وتحسين فقط على بلدي مضادة: الهجومية العالمية ولكن هذه اللعبة قد يكون من الصعب على لاعبين جدد مثل الشخص العادي سوف نصطدم جيدة جدا.
